Class LinearCombinationHeuristic

java.lang.Object
AI.mcts.Optimazation.Heuristic.LinearCombinationHeuristic
All Implemented Interfaces:
Heuristic
public final class LinearCombinationHeuristic extends Object implements Heuristic
A composite heuristic that combines multiple individual heuristics using weighted linear combination.

This heuristic allows balancing different strategic considerations by assigning weights to centrality, connectivity, and shortest path heuristics. The final score is computed as: 

 score = wCenter * centrality + wConn * connectivity + wSP * shortestPath

The shortest path component is optional and can be set to null. The shortest path weight (wSP) should typically be kept small (e.g., 0.1) as shortest path computation is more expensive and can dominate the other components.

  • Constructor Details

    • LinearCombinationHeuristic

      public LinearCombinationHeuristic(Heuristic centrality, Heuristic connectivity, Heuristic shortestPath, double wCenter, double wConn, double wSP)
      Creates a new linear combination heuristic with the specified components and weights.
      Parameters:
      centrality - the heuristic for evaluating move centrality
      connectivity - the heuristic for evaluating move connectivity
      shortestPath - the heuristic for evaluating shortest path impact, or null to disable
      wCenter - the weight for the centrality component
      wConn - the weight for the connectivity component
      wSP - the weight for the shortest path component (recommended to keep small, e.g., 0.1)

  • Method Details

    • score

      public double score(GameState state, Move move)
      Computes the weighted linear combination of all enabled heuristic components. If the shortest path heuristic is null or its weight is 0, that component is skipped.
      Specified by:
      score in interface Heuristic
      Parameters:
      state - the current game state
      move - the move to evaluate
      Returns:
      the weighted sum of all heuristic component scores
